mapper.sql: a.dbid as "dbid", a.id as "id", a.dealcode as "dealcode", a.buyerid as "buyerid", a.buyername as "buyername", a.mobile as "mobile", a.score as "score", a.grade as "grade", a.createby as "createby", a.createdate as "createdate", a.updateby as "updateby", a.updatedate as "updatedate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_mis_dunning_scorecard( id, dealcode, buyerid, buyername, mobile, score, grade, createby, createdate, updateby, updatedate ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{dealcode}, #{buyerid}, #{buyername}, #{mobile}, #{score}, #{grade}, #{createBy.name}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.name}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT o.id as "id", o.dealcode as "dealcode", o.buyer_id as "buyerid", o.first_order as "firstOrder", i.real_name as "realname", b.mobile as "mobile" FROM t_risk_order o JOIN t_risk_buyer b on o.buyer_id = b.id LEFT JOIN t_risk_buyer_idcard i on i.buyer_id = b.id WHERE o.merchant_id = '7' AND DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), o.repayment_time)= #{overduedays} AND o.status = 'payment'
